Summary: 6 orange balls rose from behind tree line,1 then 3 then 2 they seemed miles away moved to the west and then winked ouut
trends: There have been no other sightings in Clyde
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailscoming home from work after 11:30 PM car facing north.saw the first lite in sky,it was steady fairly high,put my car in my drive and walked to an electric poll to line object up to see if it was moving.it was steady but its lite or it a bright orange lite went out after 30 secands. started to walk back to my home when the next 3 rose up from behind the tree line and then went to the west,there was a small breese from the west.I ran into my home and to my wife to show her out our north bedroom window.we could see 2 of them through my brothers maple tree located 400 feet to the north of us,100 ft tall tree,lites were near the top and then they were gone.I went down stairs and me wife called to me that 2 more had appeared,they also vanished after 2 minuted. we are located about 30 miles south of lake erie and 2 miles south of rt 20,the lites could have ben any where in between here and the lake,a bright steady orange lite.
